metas.name: Fargo
metas.description: Darkly comedic crime drama with intricate plots, similar to 'All Her Fault', 'The Night Manager', and 'Brassic'.

metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: Modern take on a classic mystery, blending crime and drama, appealing to fans of 'All Her Fault', 'The Night Manager', and 'HIS & HERS'

metas.name: Peep Show
metas.description: Cult British comedy known for its cringe humor and unique perspective, aligning with the humor of 'Scrubs', 'Goodness Gracious Me' and 'It's Always Sunny'

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Anthology series exploring dark and satirical sci-fi themes, similar to 'Love, Death & Robots', 'Fallout' and 'Rick and Morty'

metas.name: Bojack Horseman
metas.description: Animated comedy with dark humor and serious themes, appealing to fans of 'The Simpsons', 'Rick and Morty', and 'Ted Lasso'

metas.name: Community
metas.description: Smart and quirky comedy with a strong ensemble cast, like 'Scrubs' and 'Ted Lasso'

metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: Critically acclaimed comedy known for its intricate running gags and ensemble cast, similar to 'It's Always Sunny'

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: Philosophical comedy with a heartwarming story, reminiscent of 'Ted Lasso' with a touch of fantasy.

metas.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
metas.description: Hilarious police comedy with a focus on character relationships, appealing to fans of 'Scrubs' and 'It's Always Sunny'

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: Psychological thriller with a complex plot and unreliable narrator, similar to the mystery elements of 'All Her Fault' and the drama of 'The Night Manager'

metas.name: The Queen's Gambit
metas.description: Character-driven drama with compelling plot and high production value, appealing to those who liked 'The Night Manager' and 'Ted Lasso'

metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: Satirical superhero show with dark humor and over-the-top action, similar to 'One-Punch Man' but with a more mature tone.

metas.name: Arcane
metas.description: Visually stunning animated series with a compelling story and mature themes, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'One-Punch Man'

metas.name: Invincible
metas.description: Animated superhero series with a dark and violent twist, similar to 'One-Punch Man' with more dramatic elements.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: Dystopian thriller with a unique premise and mind-bending mystery, appealing to fans of 'Stranger Things' and 'Foundation'

metas.name: The Expanse
metas.description: Hard sci-fi series with complex characters and political intrigue, similar to 'Foundation' and 'Fallout'

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: Complex and mind-bending sci-fi mystery with time travel elements, appealing to fans of 'Stranger Things' and 'Doctor Who'

metas.name: Maniac
metas.description: Mind-bending limited series with a surreal and dreamlike quality, similar to 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Rick and Morty'

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy with a unique premise and a focus on character relationships, similar to 'Futurama' and 'Ted Lasso'

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: Quirky and unconventional detective show with sci-fi elements, appealing to fans of 'Doctor Who' and 'Rick and Morty'

metas.name: Line of Duty
metas.description: Intense police procedural drama with complex characters and moral dilemmas, similar to 'All Her Fault' and 'HIS & HERS'

metas.name: Luther
metas.description: Dark and gritty crime drama with a complex and flawed protagonist, similar to 'All Her Fault' and 'The Night Manager'

metas.name: Happy Valley
metas.description: British crime drama with strong female lead and compelling storylines, similar to 'All Her Fault' and 'Brassic'

metas.name: Catastrophe
metas.description: British comedy with a realistic and relatable portrayal of relationships, similar to 'Brassic' and 'Ted Lasso'

metas.name: Derry Girls
metas.description: Comedy set during The Troubles in Northern Ireland, blending humor with historical context, similar to 'Brassic'

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: Mockumentary comedy about vampires living in Staten Island, blending humor with supernatural elements, similar to 'The Simpsons' and 'It's Always Sunny'

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: Optimistic and heartwarming comedy with a strong ensemble cast, similar to 'Scrubs' and 'Ted Lasso'

metas.name: The Office (US)
metas.description: Mockumentary comedy with relatable characters and awkward situations, similar to 'Scrubs' and 'It's Always Sunny'

metas.name: Flight of the Conchords
metas.description: Musical comedy about a folk duo from New Zealand trying to make it in New York City, blending humor with original songs

metas.name: Reservation Dogs
metas.description: Comedy-drama about Indigenous teenagers growing up in rural Oklahoma, blending humor with cultural themes, similar to Brassic.

metas.name: Station Eleven
metas.description: Post-apocalyptic drama with a focus on art and humanity, appealing to those who liked 'Fallout' and 'Foundation'

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: Spy thriller with a sci-fi twist, exploring parallel universes, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and 'Stranger Things'

metas.name: Legion
metas.description: Mind-bending superhero series with a unique visual style and psychological themes, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Doctor Who'

metas.name: Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.
metas.description: Action-packed superhero series with a focus on teamwork and espionage, appealing to fans of 'Doctor Who' and 'Stranger Things'

metas.name: Altered Carbon
metas.description: Cyberpunk sci-fi series with a complex plot and mature themes, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Fallout'

metas.name: Undone
metas.description: Animated series with a unique rotoscoping style, exploring themes of mental health and time travel, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Rick and Morty'

metas.name: Final Space
metas.description: Animated space opera with a mix of comedy and drama, appealing to fans of 'Futurama' and 'Rick and Morty'

metas.name: Disenchantment
metas.description: Animated fantasy comedy from the creator of 'The Simpsons', appealing to fans of 'The Simpsons', 'Futurama', and 'Rick and Morty'

metas.name: Mythic Quest
metas.description: Comedy series about a video game development studio, appealing to fans of 'Scrubs' and 'It's Always Sunny'

metas.name: Extra Ordinary
metas.description: A hidden gem of a movie turned TV series based on comedy with light fantasy elements.
